segments.text: Good morning . Vane Theater , at your service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'm thinking about watching a Chinese traditional opera with a foreign girl . What's on this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there will be charity performance on Saturday night . And also , there will be a solo concert by an opera star on Sunday night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a good thing that I have choices here . Can you tell me about the one on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . It's to raise money for the homeless .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's a reserved opera named ' The Monkey Creates Havoc in Heaven ' .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , a story about the clever Monkey King . It's a classic and children's favorite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It surely is . And the cast is really the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful ! How much is the ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The price varies according to the seats . 300 for the front , 200 for the middle , and 50 for the back . Which kind would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two for the front . One last thing , are there any English subtitles for the show ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have subtitles both in Chinese and English on the big-screen just beside the stage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Terrific . May I stop by to get that two tickets tomorrow afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . And our theater is located on Liberty Avenue , just opposite the biggest guitar store . Can I have your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Got it . Thanks for calling . Bye .
segments.speaker: S1
